page.title: 09SPORTS
page.content: Sports that go on around Ashover. There are local cricket and football teams in both Ashover and Kelstedge and they play in leagues in and around the North Derbyshire and South Yorkshire area.There is a well-known six-a-side football tounament that takes place once a year on the Ashover village sports field,and teams come from quite a wide area to take part in it.The Ashover cricket team is run by one of the villagers but many of the players in these teams are no longer from Ashover or Kelstedge. The pitches in Ashover are near the village hall and so many of the local children play on the pitch when the team isn't playing on it,and it is also used by Ashover Primary School for their games against other schools.There is also a tennis club used mainly by local villagers.
